summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganA lightweight, but highly-pigmented gradient bronzer, Live Tinted's Huebeam Gradient Blushing Bronzer gives you a perfectly sunkissed look. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to help keep skin hydrated and Niacinamide to help even skin tone, leaving a more luminous appearance. Clear
details: DetailsFeaturesBuildableDermatologist testedBenefitsGlowy, natural finishKey IngredientsNiacinamide helps fade dark spots, resulting in a more luminous, even skin toneHyaluronic Acid holds up to 1,000x its weight in moisture for advanced hydration.Item 2635926How To UseTap each shade and apply where the sun naturally hits or use a small brush to press bronzer along the cheekbone to sculpt and apply blush on the high points of your cheekbones.IngredientsMica, Talc, Nylon-12, Octyldodecanol, Methicone, Magnesium Stearate, Niacinamide, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, reviews.headline: Original was better
reviews.comments: The initial release the pans were much larger. I was happy to see the new shades but the pan is so much smaller. I still love the blushes though

reviews.headline: There's better
reviews.comments: The fall out is insane. The color is a challenge to work with.

reviews.headline: Beautiful package. Great smell.
reviews.comments: Smells great. Beautiful color. Packaging luxurious. But very light pigmented.

reviews.headline: Perfect from brown skin tone
reviews.comments: It leaves me with a sun kiss look!

reviews.headline: Not clean!
reviews.comments: Has talc :( wanted to love it but it is not a clean product. They should not be advertising as clean.

reviews.headline: One of my favorite makeup products
reviews.comments: I love this blush and bronzer in one. I use it often. Im light medium skin tone. I think its very flattering. A little goes a long way. The formula to me is great, very pigmented, smooth, glowy but not too glowy yet very natural. I love it and its lasted me for a long time now.

reviews.headline: Way to orange
reviews.comments: Altjough the pan is a big size for the money every color is very orange. Would make nice eyeshadow but ot blush buy to orange as a bronzer

reviews.headline: Fell out of the pan üò≠
reviews.comments: I absolutely loved this product but onky got to use it twice because the entire product popped out of the pan when i pulled it out to use it a third time. I had never dropped it would treated it roughly. I think its just not pressed hard enough. The sales associate said they had already had a few returned for the same reason ‚òπÔ∏è‚òπÔ∏è‚òπÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Awesome multi use product
reviews.comments: Love this item- very versatile, has staying power, and a hint if shimmer.

reviews.headline: I'm not sure about this one
reviews.comments: I bought it in place of the bare minerals bronzer because they were out. It's not even close to the same. With this one a little goes a long way and it's too orange for my skin.

reviews.headline: just eh
reviews.comments: not a great powder and has a weird smell

reviews.headline: Worst blush/bronzer ever
reviews.comments: The CEO Deepica is begging people on IG to leave comments here so that's probably where all the good reviews are coming from. This is the worst blush/bronzer I've ever used - tons of fallout and looks very chalky on.

reviews.headline: georgous shades
reviews.comments: i Usally wear fair to light- to light med foundation depending on brand. This was not to dark or light. i like to use as a blush. it's a perfect summer blush or bronzer with a rose glow. no glitter! I'm 52 and it does not show texture or any fine lines.

reviews.headline: It's pretty
reviews.comments: I love the color on my skin, it last all day. But there is a bad smell that's the only reason I gave it a 4.

reviews.headline: Beautiful Color
reviews.comments: You get quite a bit of product for the price. The compact is pretty big in size. A little bit goes a long way. The color does work for all skin shades.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Love the color versatility; nice staying power; beautiful blush and bronzer.

reviews.headline: Pleasantly Surprised
reviews.comments: This is a great all in one blush and bronzer that shows up so well on my deep medium skin. I can adapt the look by swiping more from either the top or bottom. Usually other blushes or bronzers disappear on me after a few hours. I feel like my face eats make-up away BUT This product lasted all day. It's a perfect all in one product. I can even create a subtle eyeshadow look from this product which is perfect for my conservative workplace. I read other reviews and to be honest, my product does not smell bad at all. It was very neutral smelling.  It's the favorite thing I've purchased in a long time. Very brown girl friendly.

reviews.headline: Its cute but no
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product so much - but I cannot get past the smell - like something has been fried & that the bronzer portion of this gets overpowered by the "blushing". It also is very powdery.

reviews.headline: Smells like oil gone bad
reviews.comments: I loved the way this looked on my cheeks but couldn't get past the old oil smell. Like oil that had gone bad.. I ordered and reordered this 4 times thinking maybe I got a bad batch but each time the smell was there in varying degrees. The package read fragrance free but there definitely a smell.

reviews.headline: Beautiful!
reviews.comments: I'm very pale with a cool undertone. I find that using each part of this product individually works best for me! I use more of the upper 2 colors than the bottom bronzer. This keeps the color more of a neutral/pink on my face. LiveTinted is the holy grail for all products! I can't wait to see what else they come out with!

faceoff_positive.comments: This is a great all in one blush and bronzer that shows up so well on my deep medium skin. I can adapt the look by swiping more from either the top or bottom. Usually other blushes or bronzers disappear on me after a few hours. I feel like my face eats make-up away BUT This product lasted all day. It's a perfect all in one product. I can even create a subtle eyeshadow look from this product which is perfect for my conservative workplace. I read other reviews and to be honest, my product does not smell bad at all. It was very neutral smelling.  It's the favorite thing I've purchased in a long time. Very brown girl friendly.
faceoff_positive.headline: Pleasantly Surprised

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this with the intention of using it for travel since it promised to be multi-purpose. The good: the pigment! I am a light-medium, warm-undertoned Asian whose cheeks just eat blush--I apply it, it gets sucked into another dimension. Just like the Huesticks, this shows up and stays around all day. I can use each color separately or swirl it together, however, it seemed to irritate me a bit when I used it as a shadow (I have extremely sensitive eyes, though). The bad: the size (for what I wanted). The compact is huge. I should've made a note of the diameter, but it was probably close to 4" across? Not the most convenient size for sticking in my purse or for traveling. Again, that's a personal preference, but the powder is also very soft so don't swirl your brush around b/c you will be cleaning the aftermath for quite some time. Tap gently and keep this one at home--it would make me nervous to travel with this given how loose the powder is pressed into the compact. In the end, I prefer the ease and portability of the Huesticks over this powder, so I ended up returning it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice pigment, huge compact
